title: Land for sale in Kandy district
details: Land for Sale in the Kandy District. 757 perches available. 11 km from Kandy town. 15 minutes drive from the Kandy-Kurunegala Rd. This Land is surrounded by a reservation forest. Ideal for a hotel project, housing project or apartment complex. Just 2 KM to Aladeniya main town. All facilities available like a super market, petrol station, gas etc. This land could be approached from Colombo-Kandy Rd. too. The land is just 2 KM to the proposed Kandy-Colombo expressway. Close to hotel Tree of Life. Beautiful view. Expected price 75,000.00 per perch. Contact. 0777540028. E-mail. mzmhaseen@gmail.com
